duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare estimates for potential projects ranging from $100k to $50M.
Read and understand design documents for accurate pricing.
Coordinate with procurement to attain vendor and subcontractor quotes.
Conduct Bid Walks and Hand Off Meetings with Project Manager upon award.
Consult with customers to assist in estimating future workload.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering preferred but not required.
